summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5823 for the improvement of 57th Avenue Northeast, from East 65th Street to East 70th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76768 as amended by Ordinance Nos. 76852 and 77750, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
